```{r}
#load packages
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)

#Import data
data <- read.table("ftp://aftp.cmdl.noaa.gov/products/trends/co2/co2_annmean_mlo.txt", skip = 56, col.names = c("year", "mean", "unc"))

view(data)

#Make a time series with ggplot
time_series <-ggplot(data, aes(year, mean)) +
  geom_line()
time_series
#Make one table
knitr::kable(
  data)



```
